text: @SylviaJones, it's great to see Ontario expanding its private clinic program to include hip and knee replacements! 👍🏼💪🏼 This is a smart move to reduce wait times and improve access to care, while still ensuring that procedures are covered under the provincial health care plan. 💰💫 Let's keep working towards a more efficient and effective public health care system that benefits everyone! 🌈�Canada 🍁
